<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import Developer Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)) {
		var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
		target.u_requested_for_email_1 = name.replace(" ",".") + "@example.com";
	}

})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_815336_developer_historic_dev_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-26 17:40:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>6325220c97370110ed52bfb3f153afec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Developer Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Training App" source="x_815336_developer">e576f91597530110ed52bfb3f153afd0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Training App">e576f91597530110ed52bfb3f153afd0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_6325220c97370110ed52bfb3f153afec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-27 17:22:01</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_815336_developer_dev</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
